reviewText: My family loves to rent movies on family night. One family night my 4 year old daughter picked out the Trollz movie and loved it so much she cried when we had to return it. So i decided to find the movie and buy it for her as a gift. What a gift it turned out to be! It came with another DVD. She watches them both still!
My girls kept renting these from Blockbuster and I finally bought the movies from Amazon for almost what I was renting them for! They love them and they are cute movies.

These movies are absolutely adorable. I could watch them all day. They're funny, cute, and entertaining. I think that the young and the young at heart could both enjoy these movies. They give a good message of the importance of friendship, as well. I can't wait for more.
This movie is good for girls between the ages of 8-16.  My girls have watched it over and over and over agian.  It continues to intertain them.  It moves thier imagination.
